extendedInfo.description: Michel TelÃ³ Around The World is the first and exclusive adventure game of the biggest worldwide phenomenon of Brazilian music. As always in a international tour, this journey is full of surprises, adrenaline and overcoming.Now itâs your time to help TelÃ³ to win fans around the world: avoid the most different obstacles, complete unusual missions, answer all fans, be photographed by journalists, face chaotic traffics and go as far as you can! The farther you go, the more points you earn. Go ahead in this adventure and surpass your friends and adversaries around the world in an easy-to-play, extremely fun and addictive game. Highlights / Features: Very easy to play! Only 2 commands to go over the obstacles and start the fun Run in the most famous cities of the world Dozens of fun and surprising obstacles Many kind of fans waiting for you around the world Journalist always looking for the best shots Powerups to help you going as far as you can Missions to complete with hard work Endless air bridges GameCenter and Leaderboards to compare your score with your friends More infos: http://playmicheltelo.com Michel TelÃ³: http://micheltelo.com http://facebook.com/micheltelo Doubleleft: http://doubleleft.com http://facebook.com/doubleleft

reviews.title: Good so far
